mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_desc roomDesc, r.room_status roomStatus,r.live_start_date liveStartDate,u.user_true_name userTrueName, de.position_name positionName FROM live_room r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.lecturer_id=u.id LEFT JOIN user_detail de ON u.id=de.user_id WHERE r.room_status IN(0,1) AND u.user_status=0 ORDER BY r.id DESC

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_desc roomDesc,r.play_number playNumber, u.user_true_name userTrueName,de.position_name positionName FROM live_room r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.lecturer_id=u.id LEFT JOIN user_detail de ON u.id=de.user_id WHERE r.room_status=2 AND r.publish_status=1 AND u.user_status=0 ORDER BY r.live_end_date DESC

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_desc roomDesc, r.room_status roomStatus,r.play_able playAble,r.publish_status publishStatus,r.play_number playNumber, r.live_start_date liveStartDate,r.live_end_date liveEndDate, r.room_code roomCode,r.push_server_url pushServerUrl,r.push_secret_key pushSecretKey, r.pull_rtmp_url pullRtmpUrl,r.pull_flv_url pullFlvUrl,r.pull_hls_url pullHlsUrl,r.pull_udp_url pullUdpUrl,r.video_mp4_url videoMp4Url, u.user_true_name userTrueName,u.head_pic headPic,de.hospital_name hospitalName,de.position_name positionName, de.desc userDesc FROM live_room r LEFT JOIN users u ON r.lecturer_id=u.id LEFT JOIN user_detail de ON u.id=de.user_id WHERE r.id=#{id}

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_status roomStatus,r.publish_status publishStatus,r.play_number playNumber, r.live_start_date liveStartDate,r.push_server_url pushServerUrl,r.push_secret_key pushSecretKey, r.pull_rtmp_url pullRtmpUrl,r.pull_flv_url pullFlvUrl,r.pull_hls_url pullHlsUrl,r.pull_udp_url pullUdpUrl,r.video_mp4_url videoMp4Url FROM live_room r order by r.id desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_qrCode_path roomQrCodePath,r.room_schedule_path roomSchedulePath,r.room_desc_path roomDescPath, r.room_desc roomDesc,r.room_status roomStatus,r.play_able playAble,r.publish_status publishStatus,r.play_number playNumber, r.live_start_date liveStartDate,r.live_end_date liveEndDate, r.room_code roomCode,r.push_server_url pushServerUrl,r.push_secret_key pushSecretKey, r.pull_rtmp_url pullRtmpUrl,r.pull_flv_url pullFlvUrl,r.pull_hls_url pullHlsUrl,r.pull_udp_url pullUdpUrl,r.video_mp4_url videoMp4Url FROM live_room r WHERE r.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update live_room set room_qrCode_path=#{roomQrCodePath},room_code=#{roomCode},push_server_url=#{pushServerUrl}, push_secret_key=#{pushSecretKey},push_expire_date=#{pushExpireDate},pull_rtmp_url=#{pullRtmpUrl}, pull_flv_url=#{pullFlvUrl},pull_hls_url=#{pullHlsUrl},pull_udp_url=#{pullUdpUrl},video_mp4_url=#{videoMp4Url}, updated_date=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM live_room r where r.publish_status!=2

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_status roomStatus,r.publish_status publishStatus,r.play_number playNumber, r.live_start_date liveStartDate,r.push_server_url pushServerUrl,r.push_secret_key pushSecretKey, r.pull_rtmp_url pullRtmpUrl,r.pull_flv_url pullFlvUrl,r.pull_hls_url pullHlsUrl,r.pull_udp_url pullUdpUrl,r.video_mp4_url videoMp4Url FROM live_room r where r.publish_status!=2 order by r.id desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT r.id,r.room_title roomTitle,r.room_pic_path roomPicPath,r.room_qrCode_path roomQrCodePath,r.room_schedule_path roomSchedulePath,r.room_desc_path roomDescPath, r.room_desc roomDesc,r.room_status roomStatus,r.play_able playAble,r.publish_status publishStatus,r.play_number playNumber, r.live_start_date liveStartDate,r.live_end_date liveEndDate, r.room_code roomCode,r.push_server_url pushServerUrl,r.push_secret_key pushSecretKey, r.pull_rtmp_url pullRtmpUrl,r.pull_flv_url pullFlvUrl,r.pull_hls_url pullHlsUrl,r.pull_udp_url pullUdpUrl,r.video_mp4_url videoMp4Url FROM live_room r WHERE r.room_code=#{roomCode}
